name: Sorcery (finished)
description:
In this game you have to travel through a short, platformer style world to save a village. There are 2 levels, each with hidden supplies scattered around to encourage the player to explore a bit.

Controls:

A - move left,

D - move right,

W - climb up,

S - climb down,

Left click - shoot,

E - interact (signs),

Esc - back (signs).

Have fun! :)
